title: 105_s991
content:
The table of contents in section 1 of the Omnibus Parks Act is amended by changing references to historical parks. Additionally, there is a mention of the Presidio of San Francisco in section 2. SEC. 2. THE PRESIDIO OF SAN FRANCISCO is amended in various sections of the Omnibus Parks Act, changing wording and references. SEC. 3. COLONIAL NATIONAL HISTORICAL PARK is also amended to update map details. SEC. 4. BIG THICKET NATIONAL PRESERVE. SEC. 4. BIG THICKET NATIONAL PRESERVE is amended by changing dates in section 306(d) and locations in section 306(f)(2) of the Omnibus Parks Act. SEC. 7. AMENDMENT TO BOSTON NATIONAL HISTORICAL PARK ACT. Amends section 504 of the Omnibus Parks Act by correcting a typographical error.

SEC. 8. MEMORIAL TO MARTIN LUTHER KING, JR. Amends section 508(d) of the Omnibus Parks Act by correcting a reference error.

SEC. 9. ADVISORY COUNCIL ON HISTORIC PRESERVATION REAUTHORIZATION. Amends the National Historic Preservation Act by clarifying the availability of funds for historic preservation.

SEC. 10. GREAT FALLS HISTORIC DISTRICT, NEW JERSEY. Amends section 510(a)(1) of the Omnibus Parks Act by correcting a wording error related to national heritage contributions. SEC. 11. NEW BEDFORD NATIONAL HISTORIC LANDMARK DISTRICT. Section 511 of the Omnibus Parks Act is amended to update the New Bedford National Historic Landmark District to the New Bedford Historic District. Amendments include changes to district structures, relics, and the general management plan. Authorization of appropriations is also updated for carrying out activities within the district. Amendments to the Omnibus Parks Act update the New Bedford National Historic Landmark District to the New Bedford Historic District. Changes include updating district structures, relics, and the general management plan, as well as authorizing appropriations for activities within the district. SEC. 12. NICODEMUS NATIONAL HISTORIC SITE and SEC. 13. UNALASKA are amended to correct spelling errors. SEC. 14. REVOLUTIONARY WAR AND WAR OF 1812 HISTORIC PRESERVATION STUDY is updated to remove specific language regarding the study. SEC. 15. SHENANDOAH VALLEY BATTLEFIELDS. SEC. 15. SHENANDOAH VALLEY BATTLEFIELDS is amended to update references to subsections. SEC. 16. WASHITA BATTLEFIELD is amended to correct a spelling error. SEC. 17. SKI AREA PERMIT RENTAL CHARGE. SEC. 17. SKI AREA PERMIT RENTAL CHARGE. Section 701 of the Omnibus Parks Act is amended to update terminology related to ski area permit rental charges. Subsection (f) now refers to "subpermittees" instead of "sublessees" and clarifies exceptions for bartered goods and complimentary lift tickets offered for commercial or promotional purposes. Section 814(a) of the Omnibus Parks Act is amended to update language in various paragraphs related to competitive leasing, cost-effectiveness, and lease provisions. Additionally, Section 7(c)(2) of the Land and Water Conservation Fund Act of 1965 is amended regarding the total appraised value of lands and interests. Section 814 of the Omnibus Parks Act is amended to update language related to competitive leasing, cost-effectiveness, and lease provisions. Amendments include changes in the total appraised value of lands and interests, as well as definitions within the Act. SEC. 20. BLACKSTONE RIVER VALLEY NATIONAL HERITAGE CORRIDOR. Amendment to the Act establishing the Blackstone River Valley National Heritage Corridor in Massachusetts and Rhode Island, updating fiscal years and plan approval language. SEC. 21. TALLGRASS PRAIRIE NATIONAL PRESERVE. SEC. 21. TALLGRASS PRAIRIE NATIONAL PRESERVE. Amendments made to the Omnibus Parks Act regarding the acquisition and maintenance of a portion of the ranch for the tallgrass prairie. SEC. 22. RECREATION LAKES. Amendments are made to improve recreational opportunities at federally managed manmade lakes. Additionally, changes are made to the Land and Water Conservation Fund Act of 1965 to address economic and financing aspects of recreation-related infrastructure. SEC. 23. Amendments are made to the Boston Harbor Islands Recreation Area, including changes related to the Boston-Logan International Airport. Private-sector roles and responsibilities are delineated, and revenue-raising activities are addressed. SEC. 24. Amendment to Natchez National Historical Park visitor center. SEC. 25. Amendment to fishing regulations in Alaska waters. SEC. 26. Establishment of National Coal Heritage Area. SEC. 26. Amendments to the National Coal Heritage Area include changes to historic preservation efforts in the region and the administration of properties by the Secretary. SEC. 27. TENNESSEE CIVIL WAR HERITAGE AREA is amended to include sites associated with the Civil War. SEC. 28. AUGUSTA CANAL NATIONAL HERITAGE AREA changes "National Historic Register of Historic Places" to "National Register of Historic Places." SEC. 29. ESSEX NATIONAL HERITAGE AREA updates "a visitors' center" to "a visitor center." SEC. 30. OHIO & ERIE CANAL NATIONAL HERITAGE CORRIDOR. SEC. 30. OHIO & ERIE CANAL NATIONAL HERITAGE CORRIDOR is amended by correcting punctuation errors. SEC. 31. HUDSON RIVER VALLEY NATIONAL HERITAGE AREA is amended to clarify ownership of property.
